summary: A troubled teenager attempts to conquer the love of his life by becoming the baddest boy on the block.
cast: Ayoub Elasri|Jorik Scholten|Achraf Meziani|Oussama Addi|Elsie de Brauw|Sigrid ten Napel|Olivia Lonsdale|Chaib Massaoudi|Dean Liedermooy|Peter Douwma|Colin George|Vincent van de Waal|Freddie Tratlehner|Ad Fernhout|Donny Ellerström|Jennefer Siegrist|Frank van der Schoor|Ricky van der Schoor|Dennis Foekens|Anton Verwindt|Xiomara Virdó|Andre Elvering|Rein De Vries|Diego Tauwnaar|Michiel Kerbosch

title: Prins
